name: Physical Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

When <srpgWeaponSkill:#> is set to an
equipped weapon, it will use that skill.

<srpgRange:-1>
<srpgCounterRange:-1>

(If srpgRange is set to -1, weapon or
enemy note tag range is used)


--YEP Action Sequence----------------------
<setup action>
IMMORTAL: targets, true
WAIT: 15
DISPLAY ACTION
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  MOVE user: target, BASE, 40, auto offset x -100, auto offset y +1
  MOTION STANDBY: user
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
else
  WAIT: 40
end
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
MOTION ATTACK: user
if user.attackMotion() == 'missile'
  WAIT: 25
  create object: 1, sv_arrow, user, 0, -15
  MOVE object 1: target, CENTER, 30
  WAIT: 30
  DELETE object: 1
end
ACTION EFFECT: target
if !target.result().missed && !target.result().evaded
  ATTACK ANIMATION: target
  WAIT FOR ANIMATION
else
  WAIT: 24
end
</target action>

<follow action>
IMMORTAL: targets, false
MOTION WALK: user
WAIT: 30
</follow action>

<finish action>
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  JUMP user: 60, 40
  MOVE user: RETURN, 40
  MOTION ESCAPE: user
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
end
WAIT FOR EFFECT
MOTION WALK: user
end
WAIT: 30
</finish action>

description:
味方一人のＨＰを回復する。
【射程　3】
name: Heal

description:
敵単体に炎属性の魔法攻撃。威力が高い。
【射程　2-3】【炎属性】【2回発動不可】
name: Fire
THRILLER
note:
<srpgRange:-1>
<srpgCounterRange:-1>

(If srpgRange is set to -1, weapon or
enemy note tag range is used)


--YEP Action Sequence----------------------
<setup action>
IMMORTAL: targets, true
WAIT: 15
if !user._ggeff
  MOVE user: target, BASE, 40, auto offset x -100, auto offset y +1
  MOTION STANDBY: user
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
else
  move user: targets, front, 20
  jump user: 200, 20
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
end
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
MOTION ATTACK: user
if user.attackMotion() == 'missile'
  WAIT: 25
  create object: 1, sv_arrow, user, 0, -15
  SE: Wind7
  MOVE object 1: target, CENTER, 30
  WAIT: 30
  DELETE object: 1
end
ACTION EFFECT: target
if !target.result().missed && !target.result().evaded
if !user._ggeff  
se: Slash1, 80, 100, 0
ATTACK ANIMATION: target
  WAIT FOR ANIMATION
else
TINT SCREEN: -50, -50, 255, 200, 3
CAMERA FOCUS: target, BASE, 3
zoom: 200%, 3
se: Critical, 100, 100, 0
ATTACK ANIMATION: target
  WAIT FOR ANIMATION
end
else
  WAIT: 24
end
</target action>

<follow action>
IMMORTAL: targets, false
MOTION WALK: user
TINT SCREEN: NORMAL, 3
RESET CAMERA: 10
RESET ZOOM: 10
WAIT: 30
</follow action>

<finish action>
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  JUMP user: 60, 40
  MOVE user: RETURN, 40
  MOTION ESCAPE: user
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
end
WAIT FOR EFFECT
MOTION WALK: user
end
WAIT: 30
</finish action>

name: Genuine Demon
note:
<srpgRange:-1>
<srpgCounterRange:-1>


--YEP Action Sequence----------------------
<target action>

opacity not focus: 0, 20

wait: 1

move user: target, back head, 5

wait for movement

motion attack: user

face user: target

action animation: target

se: Blow3

wait for animation


wait: 10

move user: target, front base, 5

wait for movement

motion attack: user

face user: target

action animation: target

wait for animation

reset camera: 10

action effect

move user: home

face user: forward

wait for movement

<follow action>

opacity not focus: 100%, 60

wait for opacity


</follow action>

<srpgRange:-1>

enemy note tag range is used)

if user.attackMotion() == 'missile'

  SE: Wind7

  WAIT: 30
  DELETE object: 1
end
ACTION EFFECT: target
if !target.result().missed && !target.result().evaded

  WAIT: 24

description: Deals 100% Ability Power to the first grounded enemy in a line. Applies on-hit effects. Effective against Armored units.
name: Power Wave
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:7>

<specialRange:luke>
<doubleAction:false>

<Multiple Elements: On-Hit Effect, Ranged, Projectile, Anti-Armor>

description: Grants the target ally their turn back. In addition, restores their HP to the value at the start of their previous turn or heals them by 10, whichever is greater.
name: Rewind
Spd Up+
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<After Eval>
var param = 6;
var buff = 6;
if (target._buffs[param] < buff) {
target._buffs[param] = 0;
for(var i=0; i < buff; i++){
target.addBuff(param, 2);
};
};
</After Eval>

name: Spd Up
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<After Eval>
var param = 6;
var buff = 4;
if (target._buffs[param] < buff) {
target._buffs[param] = 0;
for(var i=0; i < buff; i++){
target.addBuff(param, 2);
};
};
</After Eval>

description: For 2 turns, Monshiro gains a moonlight mirage that strikes with her, echoing 50% of the damage dealt. When foe initiates combat or uses an Active that would hit Monshiro, their first attack/Active will fail to connect.
name: Lunar Haze
Blade and Buster
note:
<srpgRange:-1>

<Post-Damage Eval>
if (!user.isStateCategoryAffected('Negate Weapon') && target.result().hpDamage > 0 && !target.isStateAffected(58)) {
BattleManager._actionBattlers.splice(BattleManager._actionBattlers.lastIndexOf(target),1);
target.addState(58);
};
</Post-Damage Eval>


--YEP Action Sequence----------------------
<setup action>
IMMORTAL: targets, true
WAIT: 15
DISPLAY ACTION
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  MOVE user: target, BASE, 40, auto offset x -100, auto offset y +1
  MOTION STANDBY: user
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
else
  WAIT: 40
end
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
MOTION ATTACK: user
if user.attackMotion() == 'missile'
  WAIT: 25
  create object: 1, sv_arrow, user, 0, -15
  MOVE object 1: target, CENTER, 30
  WAIT: 30
  DELETE object: 1
end
ACTION EFFECT: target
if !target.result().missed && !target.result().evaded
  ATTACK ANIMATION: target
  WAIT FOR ANIMATION
else
  WAIT: 24
end
</target action>

<follow action>
IMMORTAL: targets, false
MOTION WALK: user
WAIT: 30
</follow action>

<finish action>
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  JUMP user: 60, 40
  MOVE user: RETURN, 40
  MOTION ESCAPE: user
  WAIT FOR MOVEMENT
end
WAIT FOR EFFECT
MOTION WALK: user
end
WAIT: 30
</finish action>

description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 and reduces current Special Cooldown by 2, but slows Cooldown Trigger by 1.
name: Pawn
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<doubleAction:false>

<After Eval>
user._SRPGActionTimes += 1;
if (user._specialcd) {
user._specialcd = user._specialcd || 0;
user._specialcd = Math.max(user._specialcd-2,0);
user.setStateCounter(31, user._specialcd);
};
</After Eval>

description: Grants Def/Res+20, but Atk-10. Removes all debuffs and negative Status Effects from user.
name: Rook
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<doubleAction:false>

<After Eval>
user._SRPGActionTimes += 1;
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
if (user._buffs[i] < 0) {
target._buffs[i] = 0;
};
};
user.removeStateCategoryAll('Negative Status');
</After Eval>

description: Grants Speed+10 and +3 Movement Range. If unit initiates combat, grants another action to unit after combat, but take 5 damage.
name: Knight

description: Deals 125% Ability Power in an explosion in front of the user. Effective against Armored and Flying units.
name: Power Geyser
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:1>
<srpgAreaRange:3>
<noCounter>

<doubleAction:false>

<Multiple Elements: On-Hit Effect, Ranged, Projectile, Anti-Armor, Anti-Flying>

description: Deals 100% Ability Power to the first grounded enemy in a line. Effective against Armored units.
name: Power Wave
note:
(Aaroy Version)
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:7>

<specialRange:luke>
<doubleAction:false>

<Multiple Elements: On-Hit Effect, Ranged, Projectile, Anti-Armor>

description: For 1 turn, Severa receives damage in place of the target ally. Damage received is reduced by difference between Severa's Defensive stat and ally's.
name: Omnipotent Shield

description: Grants user an HP Shield equal to 30 damage, lasting up to 2 turns.
name: Self Shield

description: Swap HP with adjacent ally (neither unit can go above their max HP).
name: Solidarity
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>

<After Eval>
var oldHp = target.hp;
target.setHp(user.hp);
user.setHp(oldHp);
</After Eval>

description: For 1 turn, disable the Stance, Technique, and Aura skills of the target.
name: Rondo Binding

for(var i=0; i < buff; i++){
target.addBuff(param, 2);
};

description: Restores HP = 10 + (50% user's AP). Minimum of 15.
name: Recover

description: Execute a foe with 35% or less HP if they are afflicted with a negative Status Effect. Fails if not used from behind the foe or if foe is King class.
name: Mercy Kill
note:
<doubleAction:false>
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:1>

<After Eval>
var direction = $gameTemp.getAttackDirection();
if (direction == 'back' && b.hpRate() <= 0.35 && b.isStateCategoryAffected('Negative Status')) {
b.die();
};
</After Eval>

description: Creates a large explosive barrier around the user. Deals 100% Def as magic damage to all enemies.
name: Perfect Dark

description: Deals 80% AP Magic Damage to a single foe, reverse buffs on foe into debuffs.
name: Brainshock
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:3>
<doubleAction:false>

<Multiple Elements: Ranged, Projectile>

<After Eval>
for (var i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
if (target._buffs[i] > 0) {
var debf = target._buffs[i];
target._buffs[i] = 0;
for(var i=0; i < debf; i++){
target.addDebuff(param, 2);
};
};
}
</After Eval>

description: Inflicts Def/Res-6 on enemies in an area for 1 turn.
name: Defense Down
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:3>
<srpgAreaRange:2>
<doubleAction:false>


<After Eval>
var param = 3;
var buff = 6;
if (target._buffs[param] > (buff*-1)) {
target._buffs[param] = 0;
for(var i=0; i < buff; i++){
target.addDebuff(param, 2);
};
};
var param = 5;
var buff = 6;
if (target._buffs[param] > (buff*-1)) {
target._buffs[param] = 0;
for(var i=0; i < buff; i++){
target.addDebuff(param, 2);
};
};
</After Eval>

target._buffs[i] = 0;
};
};

description: Inflicts foe with Paralysis for 1 turn. Paralyzed enemies have Movement-3 and cannot use Active or Special skills.
name: Paralysis

description: Grants all allies in range a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 100% AP, lasting up to 2 turns.
name: Shield
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<srpgAreaRange:2>
<doubleAction:false>

<Custom Target Barrier 4 Turns>
value = user.mat;
</Custom Target Barrier 4 Turns>

description: Deals 90% AP magic damage foes in an area. Removes any buffs or positive Status Effects active on foes.
name: PSI Fire
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<srpgRange:3>
<srpgAreaRange:2>
<doubleAction:false>

<After Eval>
target.removeStateCategoryAll('Positive Status');
for (var i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
if (target._buffs[i] > 0) {
target._buffs[i] = 0;
};
}
</After Eval>

description: Deals random magic damage to foes in an AoE explosion, between 25% and 150% AP. If between 100-150%, has a 20% to OHKO the foe.
name: PSI Flash

description: Deals 100% AP magic damage to a single foe and Freezes them for 1 turn. Frozen enemies cannot move or attack. The first physical attack against a Frozen enemy will ignore the Frozen target's Def and shatter the ice.
name: PSI Freeze

description: Grants all allies in range a shield for 50% of the user's AP, lasting up to 3 turns.
name: PSI Shield
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<srpgAreaRange:5>
<doubleAction:false>

<Custom Target Barrier 6 Turns>
value = Math.round(user.mat*0.5);
</Custom Target Barrier 6 Turns>

damage.formula: var boostdmg = 0;if (b.hpRate() == 1) {boostdmg += 1;};if (a.hpRate() == 1) {boostdmg += 1;};if (b.hpRate() <= 0.5) {boostdmg += 1;};if (a.hpRate() <= 0.5) {boostdmg += 1;};for (var i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {if (b._buffs[i] < 0) {boostdmg += 1;};if (a._buffs[i] > 0) {boostdmg += 1;};};if (b.isStateCategoryAffected('Negative Status')) {boostdmg += 1;};if (a.isStateCategoryAffected('Positive Status')) {boostdmg += 1;};(boostdmg == 0 ? a.mat*0.5:a.mat*(1.0+(0.2*boostdmg)))

description: Deals 100% AP magic damage to all enemies in range. Damage is increased by 20% AP for each of the following criteria met: Foe at 100% HP||User at 100% HP||Foe HP below 50%||User HP below 50%||Foe afflicted by stat debuff||User afflicted by stat buff||Foe afflicted by negative status ailment||User afflicted with positive status ailment. If none of the criteria are met, damage is decreased by 50%.
name: PSI Rockin

description: User gains +2 Movement range and can bypass ZoCs for 1 turn.
name: Pirate Scout

description: User swaps position with target User gains an HP barrier equal equal to their Spd and can move again if used on new ally. Until the end of the turn, reduce damage taken by difference in Spd between user and foe.
name: Precognition
note:
<srpgMinRange:1>
<doubleAction:false>



<After Eval>
a.swap(b);
user.addState(171);
if (!b.isStateAffected(172)) {
user._SRPGActionTimes += 1;
user.gainBarrier(user.agi, 2);
};
b.addState(172);
</After Eval>

description: Grants Atk+10 and deal bonus true damage = 25% of unit's Atk. If unit initiates combat, take 5 damage after combat.
name: Bishop
